chart.title: Population of young, working-age and elderly

Population - Sex: all - Age: 65+ - Varia.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.This only includesages 65+.
Population - Sex: all - Age: 65+ - Varia.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Population - Sex: all - Age: 65+ - Varia.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Population,ages 65+ – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Population - Sex: all - Age: 15-64 - Var.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.This only includesages 15-64.
Population - Sex: all - Age: 15-64 - Var.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Population - Sex: all - Age: 15-64 - Var.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Population,ages 15-64 – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Population - Sex: all - Age: 0-14 - Vari.descriptionShort: De facto total population in a country, area or region as of 1 July of the year indicated.This only includesages 0-14.
